method.name: removeIt
method.comment: Removes the current event from the bus. It stays on the bus until removed or superceded.

method.name: sendIt
method.comment: Post a "sticky" event on the bus. This allows non-running or in background activities to have the event delivered when they are active. "sticky" events stay on the bus until removed or superceded.

method.name: unregister
method.comment: Be sure to unsubscribe from the bus when you (or someone else) kills your app or sends it to the background.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Subscribes your activity to the event bus. Make sure to unsubscribe later
